pages.text: $(bgreen)Coffee Bean$() always likes to use his favorite movie to wake others up. This method is quite effective, at least his little friend can see a birdman every time he opens his eyes.$(br)$(byellow)Sun Cost$() : $(l)75$()$(br)$(bblue)Recharge$() : $(l)Fast$()$(br)$(l)Features$() : It is a $(l)instant-assist$() plant that can $(bred)wake plants up$() in 2.5 blocks, making them not naturally sleep several days.
